attributes.action: to stop the misuse of ASBOs for minor, petty reasons and limit them to people charged with non fatal offences 1861
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This request is for a change in the law to have higher criteria necessary for ASBOs, due to the misuse of it in current law that allows those with the power to set them using them incoherently and often just against youths with little or trivial justification.
